messages.subject: Re: beginning unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, I m always getting ahead of myself. ;-) Thank you for getting me here sooner than I could myself. love, Valerie ... that.
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, I'm always getting ahead of myself. ;-)

Thank you for getting me here sooner than I could myself.

love, Valerie

> You were here, before you were here Valerie! Betcha didn't know
that.
>
> Ren

messages.subject: beginning unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ahem.. I can think of one The Unprocessed Child: Living Without School by Valerie Fitzenreiter www.ubpub.com (free chapter there) Valerie s book, along with
messages.messageBody:
"ahem.. I can think of one

The Unprocessed Child: Living Without School
by Valerie Fitzenreiter
www.ubpub.com (free chapter there)"

Valerie's book, along with MANY other wonderful resources, are
listed in the "links" section of this website. We're adding to it a
little at at time, so check back often.:) Anyone looking for great
unschooling websites, books and other resources really should check
it out.

You were here, before you were here Valerie! Betcha didn't know that.

Ren
